title: ni dhivya
sahitya:
nI divya pAdamulaku nitya shubha mangaLam
anupallavi

Adipura vihAriNi akhila janulu sEvinceDu

caraNam 1

phala lOcanuni rANi pAvani parama kalyANi 
cAla namminavArini callagAnu brrOceDi
   

caraNam 2

nAga bhUSaNi nArAyaNi sukhapANi 
tyAgarAjEshvaruni rANi daya jUDumani kulavENi
   

caraNam 3

bhUpAlula pogaDani gOpAladAsuni ikanu 
kApADavE kAtyAyani kanna talli tripurasundari
